document_data.mainbody:
Fist Smithwynn was a member of the Flaming Fist mercenary company from the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Smithwynn was a human man with a clean-shaven face, blue eyes, and a light skin tone. He wore a set of chainmail armor as a part of her Flaming Fist uniform decorated with a tabard that bore the companys banner, and was armed with a spear and a shield.
In the , Fist Smithwynn was stationed within the barracks of the Heapside district of Baldurs Gate, where he, a steel watcher, and several other Flaming Fists guarded a small dungeon prison.
